txt_en: The greatest stories are lived, not told.
txt_cn: 人生史诗，行胜于言。

txt_en: Be curious, not judgmental.
txt_cn: 保持好奇，莫妄评判。

txt_en: We contain multitudes.
txt_cn: 内在自有天地宽。

txt_en: The greatest rebellion is choosing joy in a world that sells despair.
txt_cn: 世界兜售痛苦时，快乐即是抗争。

txt_en: The only way to make sense out of change is to plunge into it.
txt_cn: 接受变化，才能领悟其意义。

txt_en: Tomorrow is a song we haven't heard yet.
txt_cn: 未来是待谱的乐章。

txt_en: I get a job to do.
txt_cn: 我有任务在身。

txt_en: Every woman's story deserves to be heard.
txt_cn: 每位女性的故事都值得被倾听。

txt_en: The only way to grow is to embrace discomfort.
txt_cn: 唯有直面不适，方能破茧成蝶。

txt_en: Kindness costs nothing but means everything.
txt_cn: 善良无价但意义非凡。

txt_en: The strongest trees grow in stormy winds.
txt_cn: 疾风知劲木，烈火见真金。

txt_en: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
txt_cn: 以行动书写未来。

txt_en: The only thing you can do is be the best version of yourself.
txt_cn: 你唯一能做的，就是成为最好的自己。

txt_en: You don't need to see the whole staircase, just take the first step.
txt_cn: 启程无需答案，行动自有方向。

txt_en: Don't wait. The time will never be just right.
txt_cn: 别等待，永远没有完美时机。

txt_en: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
txt_cn: 人生何时都能启新程，逐新梦。

txt_en: The world is full of magic things, patiently waiting for our senses to grow sharper.
txt_cn: 世间万千奇迹，静候你我洞见。

txt_en: To love oneself is the beginning of a lifelong romance.
txt_cn: 爱自己是终身浪漫的开始。

txt_en: Unrestricted AI, easy-going YOGA.
txt_cn: 随心AI，自在YOGA。

txt_en: Spring awakens pink blossoms as raindrops kiss fresh green grass.
txt_cn: 春日唤醒粉红花朵，雨滴亲吻新绿的青草。

txt_en: The soul that sees beauty may sometimes walk alone.
txt_cn: 寻美多孤旅，独行载星河。

txt_en: Grief is just love with nowhere to park.
txt_cn: 悲伤不过是无处停泊的爱。
